summary: A comprehensive test module that validates the SCTP transport layer used in WebRTC, including packet parsing/serialization, stream management, transport state handling, congestion control, timers, and error scenarios.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the WebRTC data channel implementation by exercising the SCTP transport logic against protocol specifications and edgeâ€‘case conditions, thereby preventing regressions in production deployments.
